overview:
Akos has a wide range of experience from programming in assembly to building highly scaleable architectures, making him able to oversee the technological progress from designing the architecture, to managing a project team of up to 5 people and delivering in time.

Akos has also won numerous innvation awards for his work, which is reflected in the creativity and new ideas in his everyday work.

degrees.subject: Computer Sciences
degrees.institution: Budapest University of Technology and Economics
